casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bryant Lamont GWYNN. No. 158P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 4, 2007. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Raleigh, for Gwynn. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 719.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of April 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of April 2007."
